name: RAM (RamProduction)
description:
Disclaimer: Contains blood & gore

Have you ever played DOOM and just thought "Maan, I wish these enemies were adorable little animals that I was just slaughtering like a madman, while actually playing as a Ram in a bright and cute environment!"? Then we have just the game for you.

The little ram, Rammy, wakes up one day to find his beekeeper parents mysteriously kidnapped. Following their trail to a wolf camp, Rammy - a descendant from a great fighting bull - sees red and sets off on an insane rampage, slaughtering anyone standing in his way.
